table_summary: Summary of financial performance metrics for different industries including PBV, ROE, EV/ Invested Capital, and ROIC.End Game - To estimate ratios of market values (equity and firm) to book value (equity and firm), with companion variables (ROE and ROC)Number of firms - Number of firms in the industry grouping. - Law of large numbers?,PBV - Aggregated market capitalization divided by aggregated book value of equity, across all firms in the group. - Measure of market value of equity, relative to accounting value of equity,ROE - Aggregate net income divided by aggregated book value of equity, across companies in group. - Measure of returns earned on projects, to equity investors,EV/ Invested Capital - Aggregated enterprise value divided by aggregated invested capital, across all firms in the group. (EV = Market Cap + Debt - Cash, Invested Capital = BV of equity + Debt - Cash) - Measure of market value of firm,  relative to accounting value of firm,ROIC - Aggregate after-tax operating income divided by aggregated invested capital, across companies in group. - Measure of returns earned on projects, to all claim holders
